content: 6 12 single_crochet= 48 13 5 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 54 place eyes between rounds 11 and 12 leaving 13 holes between them 1st eye is placed before the 2nd increase count 13 holes after the first eye and place the 2nd eye if you want the sunken eye look do not place the backs of the eyes on until round 22 tip you may have to adjust the eye placement depending on yarn and hook size you use 14-19 single_crochet in each st around 20 7 single_crochet decrease x 6= 48 21 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 42 22 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 36 now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it 23 4 single_crochet decrease x 6= 30 24 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 25 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 26 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 27 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 3 sweet oddity art 4 legs and body starting with legs make 2 starting with f make 2 hooves 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 single_crochet in each st around do not f/o the 2nd hoof continue crocheting to connect them 1 work a single_crochet in the 1st hoof 2 more single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase x 2= 15 2 single_crochet in each st around change to color b 3 single_crochet in each st around 4 4 single_crochet increase x 3= 18 5 single_crochet in each st around 6 5 single_crochet increase x 3= 21 7 single_crochet in each st around on the 2nd leg work an additional 16 single_crochet this is to move the starting point do not f/o the 2nd leg continue crocheting to connect the legs together 1 chain 3 work a single_crochet on the 1st leg to connect them together work 20 more single_crochet around the 1st leg work 3 single_crochet on the back of the chain 3 work 21 single_crochet on the 2nd leg work 3 single_crochet on the front of the chain 3= 48 sweet oddity art 5 body continued 2 single_crochet in each st around start stuffing the legs and stuff the body as you work 3 7 single_crochet increase x 6= 54 4 8 single_crochet increase x 6=
